name: Hellhound Heresy
description:
Look, you might've died and gone to Hell, but that doesn't mean you can't help out the local hellhounds with your snazzy tarot deck, even if they are trying to eat you! Choose the right cards for the right situations, and you just might be the first human to make it out...

Developed for Mini Jam 69: Hell
Note: This game isn't 100% complete. We'll be adding a second route as soon as we can! Thank you for your patience. :D

Credits:

  • Monnettie - Design & Writing
  • Puffles - Art & UI Programming
  • MD Wade - Programming
